net.cloud.gfx.elements

Interface Container<T extends Element>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Restrictive type on what kinds of Elements may be contained
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractModalDialog, ConfirmationDialog, HorizontalView, InputDialog, Interface, LoginInterface, MessageDialog, PriorityContainer, QuasiRoot, SpriteTestInterface, TestModalDialog, VerticalView

    public interface Container<T extends Element>
    Interface for Container-like elements. These are elements which compose themselves of other elements, freely allowing those other elements to be added and removed. Some type restriction may be placed, so that only certain types may be added. Most often this will just be Element, though.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(T newChild)
      Add an element to this container.
      boolean remove(T child)
      Remove the given element from this container.
      void removeAllChildren()
      Remove all of the children from this Container.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(T newChild)
        Add an element to this container. Thread-safe. Assigns the parent of the element to be this container.
        Parameters:
        newChild - The element to add to this container

      • remove

        boolean remove(T child)
        Remove the given element from this container. The parent of the element is reset to null, regardless of result.
        Parameters:
        child - The element to remove from this Container
        Returns:
        True if the element was indeed removed

      • removeAllChildren

        void removeAllChildren()
        Remove all of the children from this Container. Each of the children has its parent set to null.
